_meta.source: Researched from Seward tourism, Kenai Fjords NP, and Alaska cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Seward town, Resurrection Bay, and Kenai Fjords

transit_routes.name: Walk to Downtown
transit_routes.note: Easy walk along scenic waterfront to downtown and SeaLife Center.

transit_routes.name: Kenai Fjords Day Cruise
transit_routes.note: Full-day cruise to tidewater glaciers, whales, puffins. Half-day options available.

featured_experiences.name: Kenai Fjords National Park Cruise
featured_experiences.note: Premier Alaska fjord experience. Book ahead. Bring layers and seasickness remedies.

featured_experiences.name: Exit Glacier Hike
featured_experiences.note: Only road-accessible glacier in park. 12 miles from town. Multiple trail options.

featured_experiences.name: Alaska SeaLife Center
featured_experiences.note: Walk from dock. Great rainy-day option. Research and rehabilitation facility.
